showQuestion

private boolean showQuestion(java.lang.String message)
Used to ask the user questions when saving the alternative. These could be status questions (to supply a history) or ask for confirmation if they try to select a previously rejected alternative

Parameters:
message -
Returns:
the response to the dialog
